title: Nascent Naturals - Canadian Wholesale Aromatherapy/Cosmetic Ingredients

description: Nascent Naturals is a Canadian wholesale supplier of aromatherapy supplies, natural cosmetic ingredients & bases, packaging and so much more!
cleaned_text: We're in the thick of winter right now. We're battling mountains of snow, and its' cold. It's FREEZING, and the air is dry. This can put your skin through the ringer and may require some extra TLC. Not to worry, there are a few carrier and essential oils that can help sooth and heal dry,
